title: 二叉树的右视图 (Binary Tree Right Side View)
content: 思路: // @Title: 二叉树的右视图 (Binary Tree Right Side View) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-14 23:27:09 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 40.8 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public List<Integer> rightSideView(TreeNode root) { List<Integer> result = new ArrayList<>(); if (root == null) { return result; } Queue<TreeNode> queue = new LinkedList<>(); queue.offer(root); while (!queue.isEmpty()) { Integer temp=0; int size = queue.size(); while (size > 0) { TreeNode node = queue.poll(); temp=node.val; if (node.left != null) { queue.offer(node.left); } if (node.right != null) { queue.offer(node.right); } size--; } result.add(temp); } return result; } }
